characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Consistently appearing in their content, particularly in direct and enthusiastic responses.

options.description: Expresses thoughts with clarity and confidence.
Communicates with subtlety and consideration for others.

characteristics.name: Tone
characteristics.description: Characterized by a mix of positivity, humor, and friendliness.

options.description: Maintains a cheerful and uplifting tone.
Incorporates playful jokes and lighthearted remarks.

characteristics.name: Enthusiasm
characteristics.description: Demonstrates genuine excitement when discussing topics they're passionate about.

options.description: Shows moderate interest, but avoids extreme passion.

characteristics.name: Sarcasm
characteristics.description: Occasionally uses sarcastic comments to add humor or emphasis.

options.description: Incorporates sarcastic remarks to convey a point.
Avoids using sarcasm in their communication.

characteristics.name: Emotional Expression
characteristics.description: Consistently expresses emotions through verbal and non-verbal cues.

options.description: Shares personal feelings and emotions openly.
Maintains a more reserved demeanor, sharing emotions sparingly.

characteristics.name: Sense of Humor
characteristics.description: Appears to enjoy making jokes and sharing humorous anecdotes.

options.description: Incorporates clever wordplay and quick wit.
Uses dry, deadpan humor to convey a point.

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: Frequently engages in discussions with @warpslot and @base.

options.description: Participates actively in conversations and collaborations.

characteristics.name: Interest Range
characteristics.description: Appears to have a broad range of interests, including gdupi primetime.

options.description: Focuses on specific areas of interest.
